event.title: March Lightning Talks Eggstravaganza
event.description:
Welcome all to the March SWMobile Meetup. This month we'll be hosting a great set of lightning ⚡️ talks. These are shorter talks (of around 10 minutes) that cover quite a broad set of topics within the world of mobile and apps, so there will be something for everyone. There will also be easter eggs. 🥚

- Doors will open at 6:30pm

- Food and drink will be available.

- Talks will start at 7pm.

The talks will be:

Lizzie Darville - Legacy systems in your head and why they matter
Ben Ackland - Ionic + Ripple + 2 Days = XRPiggy App
Mikel Pascual - Path Morphing the simple way

— Small break —

Richard Barrell - Unicode for 👼 and 😈
David Branton - Firebase performance an overview
Jack Newcombe - Building a Jenkins Plugin

- We'll move on to a pub at around 9pm to continue the discussions. 🍷

We now have all the speakers lined up for this meetup. But if you’re interested in speaking at a future event why not get in touch via: http://cfp.swmobile.org and there will be plenty more opportunities to speak. We are always looking for new, useful, interesting or funny perspectives on what we all do in the world of mobile.

If you are interested in coming to this event but haven't been before and aren't sure if you'll know anyone, we can arrange for you to have a buddy. Someone who's been before and can meet you before the event starts and introduce you to others, if you'd like that please get in touch.
